thread.title: National Association of Professional Women Inducts Janet Lawrence, M.D., C2C Solutions, Into its VIP Professional Woman of the Year Circle

author: cbs8
title: National Association of Professional Women Inducts Janet Lawrence, M.D., C2C Solutions, Into its VIP Professional Woman of the Year Circle
text:
Dr. Janet Lawrence selected for her outstanding leadership and commitment within her profession
Garden City, NY (PRWEB) September 08, 2015
The National Association of Professional Women (NAPW) honors Dr. Janet Lawrence as a 2015-2016 inductee into its VIP Woman of the Year Circle. She is recognized with this prestigious distinction for leadership in healthcare administration. NAPW is the nation’s leading networking organization exclusively for professional women, boasting more than 700,000 members and over 200 operating Local Chapters.
“I’m pleased to welcome Janet into this exceptional group of professional women,” said NAPW President Star Jones. “Her knowledge and experience in her industry are valuable assets to her company and community.”
In her maintenance of the quality program and medical reviews of C2C Solutions , a qualified independent contractor (QIC), Janet Lawrence has successfully streamlined the company’s durable medical equipment contract and staff of physician reviewers. After acquiring an M.D. at Michigan State University, she started out in the field consulting Q / A reviews for Medicare. Once she received a referral from a nurse manager, Dr. Lawrence moved to the healthcare administration side of Medicare processing at C2C Solutions.
Her organizational skills and expertise in Medicare have made her a leader in the field. In the future, Dr. Lawrence aims to continue to expand her knowledge and grow personally and professionally. She wants to seek new opportunities to advance in her career as well as maintain the balance she has established at C2C Solutions. Dr. Lawrence is also actively involved in charities such as the National Wildlife Federation, Sierra Club and National Parks Conservation.
Awards & Accomplishments: Member of AMA, NMA, ACP, Red Cross, National Wildlife Federation
About NAPW
NAPW’s mission is to provide an exclusive, highly advanced networking forum to successful women executives, professionals and entrepreneurs where they can aspire, connect and achieve. Through innovative resources, unique tools and progressive benefits, professional women interact, exchange ideas, advance their knowledge and empower each other.
